tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE artist_contracts (
    artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_date DATE,
    performance_fee DECIMAL(10, 2),
    scheduling_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE artist_contracts (
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    performance_fee DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    agreement_details TEXT,
    schedule_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE artist_schedule (
    schedule_id INT NOT NULL,
    artist_id INT NOT NULL,
    schedule_date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ArtistContracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    performance_fee DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    agreement_date DATE,
    festival_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE SchedulingDetails (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    venue_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE FestivalDetails (
    festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    festival_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Artist (
  artist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  genre VARCHAR(100),
  contract_start_date DATE,
  contract_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Performance (
  performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_id UUID REFERENCES Artist(artist_id),
  venue_name VARCHAR(255),
  performance_date DATE,
  performance_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  performance_id UUID REFERENCES Performance(performance_id),
  stage_number INT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Performance (
    performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id UUID REFERENCES Artist(artist_id),
    performance_date DATE,
    venue_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    fee DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Booking (
    booking_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id UUID REFERENCES Artist(artist_id),
    performance_id UUID REFERENCES Performance(performance_id),
    festival_id UUID REFERENCES Festival(festival_id),
    booking_date DATE
);
